artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; sailboats on water at L; trees at R; grasses in foreground; oranges and reds
inscription: 近江八景の内　矢橋　大正六年七月 {Ōmi hakkei no uchi Yabase, Taishō rokunen shichigatsu} (The Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Yabase, July 1917)
markings: red collector seal: 杜品 {Tobin}; on back, red seal 伊藤深水画　近江八景矢橋　摺刷二百枚限の内　第四十六番 {Itō Shinsui ga, Ōmi hakkei Yabase shūsatsu nihyaku mai kagiri no uchi, dai yonjūroku ban} (picture by Itō Shinsui, Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Yabase, printed edition of 200, number 46); red square publisher seals: 版元 {hanmoto} (publisher), ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Lake Biwa (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景の内)
title: Yabase
